A

Action - Interface in actionPackage
The Action interface define what each action must have.
action() - Method in class charaterPackage.Player
Only a player can do an action, so we don't do it in a monster character
ActionAdapter<T> - Class in actionPackage
The Action adapter permit to adapt our action menu to the different kind of actions and her specifications.

Define a Type for the menu of the action
